评论详情: this is a solid cotton sweatshirt.  It is oversized and a bit boxy -- basically, a comy sweatshirt.  It is a little longer in the back.  It is a nice, thick material.  I liked it so much that I ordered another color.
This sweatshirt is very pretty, I got the blue.  Size is good I got a medium TTS. It’s very soft inside and out. I would definitely buy this again.
Love this sweatshirt.  Fit and quality is great.  The perfect sweatshirt for a cold day.
Love the size and so soft. Will probably get in more colors. Love it

I’m always in the market for tops that cover my flaws (bit of a belly) and flatter at the same time.  Was hoping this would be the case with this sweatshirt but the medium on me (I’m 5.6 and 153 lbs) was just to big and boxy looking.  I feel you have to be quite thin to pull off a really boxy look.
Great material and it is beautiful. It is on the wide side. I wish it was less wide.

I bought this originally because of surgery I needed a rounded my neck.  Wanted to make sure it wouldn’t be too tight, yet comfortable!!  This has been perfect and still hides my booty!!!  So of course had to buy more in other others.

I took a chance on this sweatshirt and sure glad I did. It is super soft, very cute on and did not shrink at all. The fit was perfect for me, as I am 5'3" and everything I buy usually hangs to my knees. I chose this sweatshirt because of the cut, just the right length in front of the and covers nicely in the back without being too long!
Thick and great quality

评论概述: Color is nice but boxy fit
评论详情: The color is nice, the fabric is nice but the shape is very boxy - not super flattering but it is a sweatshirt. Not dressy but sporty and cute. Amazon recommended a Medium but I should have ordered small. I’m 5’3 and 130lbs.
Sooo comfortable! I wanted it as a sweater dress so bought the largest size. It's perfect! It washed perfectly with on shrinking and the black color is still beautiful and dark.
Very cute and warm. True to size
The slits and seaming detail make this more elevated then your basic sweatshirt.  I got light gray.  It’s fuzzy on inside..nice and cozy.

评论概述: sizing and style just right for me
评论详情: to keep me warm in the colder months to come in the Northeast.
This sweatshirt is so comfy and is very well made. I will be ordering again in a few other colors.
I bought an extra large even though I wear a 2xl and it fit fine.  It's super cute and the material is good quality.

评论概述: Returned it - review based only on Beige color
评论详情: The sweatshirt is very cute, not as soft as I expected but nonetheless cute.  The reason I returned it I because the color was not Beige it appeared to be Peach- very soft peach color.  So if you’re thinking bout ordering the “beige” go with another color- darker preferably .I ordered a M bc I like it biggish in me, I’m 5’3 and about 125lbs
Nice thick material. Stylish fit. Runs a size small in my opinion.
While it is well made and the material is nice and thick. It is very boxy and un flattering. Returned.
Very small and short
Love it

Love the style of this sweatshirt. Material is very soft and has a nice weight to it. It has some stretch to it but it when I lift my arms above my shoulders it gets pulled up and feels awkward and tight. Hoping that will disappear after some wearing and washing. I normally wear a S but reviews said to size up and I’m glad I got a medium, it’s roomier but not crazy big.

Great sweatshirt and color, unfortunately, I'm a pear shape with a long torso and the slits on the side fell right at the widest part of my hips and was not flattering on my body shape.  Otherwise, I liked everything about it.

I'm 5'7" around 115ish lbs, and I got a medium because I like oversized sweatshirts. The medium fits pretty close to the picture hem-length-wise, but I'm not sure what size the model is supposed to be wearing. The sleeves aren't quite as long, though. I honestly think I would have been happy with a large for a better oversized feel, but the medium is still good and the sweatshirt is really soft and comfy. The main takeaway is definitely size up - maybe even two sizes if you like looser fits.

I like wearing this to the gym. I wear a 0/2 but the smallest available size is a 4-6. Despite that it gives a nice oversized look. The polyester material makes it feel like a classic gym sweatshirt but it’s still cute to pair with leggings with the layered bottom.
This sweater is super warm and comfy. Looks super cute with leggings and jeans. Simple and really cute and flattering cut.

评论概述: Comfy and fits true to size
评论详情: The BTFBM Women’s Casual Crewneck Sweatshirt is a fantastic choice for fall and winter, combining comfort with a stylish design. The soft fleece material makes it cozy and warm, while the side slits add a unique touch that gives the sweatshirt a relaxed, flattering fit. It’s perfect for everything from lounging to casual outings, and the crewneck cut is classic and easy to layer.  The long sleeves and lightweight fleece make it ideal for the cooler months, and the fit is true to size, so it’s comfortable without feeling too bulky. I love pairing it with leggings or jeans for a cozy yet put-together look.
This shirt is so cute on.  I love how roomy it is and I love the structure.  Thinking about buying a second in a different color.
Very soft and comfortable

The interior of this sweatshirt is very soft -- huge fan. However, I can't really get over the color. It's not an off-white or light beige. It ended up being more of a faded peachy pink/yellow, which I was not a fan of. I also did like the style, the sides slits, and the thick texture, but yeah, the color was a dealbreaker for me. (sigh)

Super cute and super comfy! Comfortable and warm but also stylish so you don’t look like a slob in sweats! Good weight, not thin and flimsy, fits the way a sweatshirt should, a little oversized but not too much. I ordered an xl, same as all my other shirts and it fits as expected.
This fits really well and is both comfortable and warm. Cute green for fall!

This is a boxy sweatshirt, the cut is cute, but the material is a little stiff so it doesn’t lay on me quite right. The garment felt soft on the inside but really strange on the outside, like it was treated with something. It could be a cute piece, but it didn’t work for me

This sweatshirt is fantastic and so cute! It is soft and fuzzy inside and I love the crisp white color. It comes to just below my bottom and is very flattering. I have washed and dried it with success and it has become my go-to when I want to be cozy and cute. It looks so cute with sneakers and leggings or with a skirt and sandals. It is my new fave and I want another one! I am usually a medium in tops and the medium in this was perfect. I could have sized up for a little more of an oversized look but it love the way it fits even after being dried. I am 5'6"/155lbs/size 8.
I just love this sweatshirt!  I bought the white in a size medium.  It fits perfectly.  It’s soft, cozy, nice quality, and super cute.
This sweatshirt I amazing!  The green is a perfect forest green and it's oversized and loose in just the right places.  Highly Recommend!

This is a really really pretty and stylish sweatshirt. The rear is a little lower than the front, which I like. The color is a gorgeous deep teal blue. The thing I like most? The fact that it's an actual sweatshirt. Sometimes you don't know what you're gonna get. This actually has the fuzzy sweatshirt material inside that is so soft. I also like that it actually is 50% cotton. So many shirts are almost all polyester now. I received a size large and it seems to fit true to size. I am a size 12 and it is very comfortable. Seems to be a very high-quality sweatshirt that will last.

This sweatshirt is beautiful it is so soft and feels great against your skin. The only thing is I would not wear it alone there is a big gap where the fabric does not touch your underarm, so this works perfect over another shirt or tank. I usually wear a size 14/16 shirt and the X-Large fits perfect not to loose (except underarms) and lies perfectly over your hips. The oversize in the arm area is the design of this sweatshirt and I love it as I put it on when it cools while riding motorcycles and there is no restriction and the fitted lower sleeves keeps out the air. I will be getting another color.
The shirt is a pretty medium green color. I got my usual size and it fits comfy and boxy just like the pictures. It’s on the thinner side for a sweatshirt which I prefer.
This will be my go-to top for the fall and winter. I love the green color, and it is super comfortable. It fits nicely and feels good on the skin. It is very well made.

I love this sweatshirt!  I especially like that it's loose all over, especially at the bottom, and the XL is true to size.  I'm a 14 and it fits me like the picture.  The different front and back lengths make it trendy and stylish and  the poly/cotton fabric is what I like my sweatshirts made of.  It will wash well, remain soft and won't shrink to the same degree all cotton sweatshirts do.  The cuff's are trendy extra long, but you can roll them up or they're loose enough to push up and stay up.  I'm looking forward to wearing this for a long time.

I'm typically small to medium in sweatshirts like this but I decided to size up for more rear-end coverage and I'm happy that I did.  The shirt itself is identical to the picture and the green color is lovely for fall.  The best part though is that this shirt is actually fleece inside and not the typical terry loop (which I hate), so it's very soft and warm. Great shirt, will likely purchase another color when it's on deal.

This feels like a material that will actually hold its shape and look great after many wears. The cut and detail work on the front are really unique and flattering. It’s roomy and cozy, but still gives a little style with these details. Fit is true to size - I’m wearing a large at 5’10” average build. It’s not super long on me, but hits me mid hip like the pictures. I’m really happy with the grey as well. Super cute with leggings or jeans!

This sweater runs big. I ordered one size down and it fits bigger than usual still. I love the uneven cut of the sweatshirt that it covers more on my back and the shorter cut in the front makes it look stylish. I wore it with black legging and it’s looks very nice. It has soft inners so it sits soft on my skin. No itching whatsoever. It is also very cozy!
I love this high quality sweatshirt. The fabric is perfect and the oversized fit is so comfy.

This sweatshirt is very cozy and comfortable. I like that the front has the side slits so it's able to be tucked in separately from the back. The sleeve cuffs are fitted on the ends but not tight. I am 5'2, slim, and ordered my normal size small. It was loose, but not hugely oversized. If you are looking for an oversized fit, I would size up one. I will be wearing this sweatshirt on repeat this fall/winter.

This sweatshirt is very cozy and comfortable. It is oversized. I like that the front is able to be tucked in or left out separately from the back. The sleeve cuffs are fitted on the ends but not tight. I am “5’7” 180 lbs and ordered an XL and it fits just the way I wanted it to with plenty room. I will be nice and warm this Fall/ Winter and look cute too!

I really like this shirt! It feels greats looks great on. It has a great oversized feel. I wear a M and ordered a M and it still has the oversized look so unless you want it really big you don’t have to upsize. I love the white and hope I can keep it looking good. I love the style it’s trendy but also timeless. Very pleased!  Review for BTFBM Women's Casual Crewneck Sweatshirts
Comfortable, soft, nice size and weight, well made, fits to size. And the color is fantastic. I really like this one all the way around.
super comfy and cute, material is great

This trendy sweatshirt has slit sides and the back is longer than the front -- and it looks great. It's soft and comfortable and roomy. It's a 50/50 blend of cotton and polyester, and feels like it will hold up really well under repeated launderings -- the polyester will ensure it won't shrink or fade, while the cotton breathes and feels really nice.  The sweatshirt is snuggly warm and just right for lounging around or wearing over leggings or jeans when going out. The dark green is as shown. I'm really happy with it.
Oversized , quality material -so soft against your skin.Deep coffee color - looks like suede !  Match with pants, leggings , skirts.  Way nicer & more unique than other similar tops.  Durable !
Adorable sweatshirt and very cozy. Runs true to size with a relaxed fit. This will be perfect for Southern California Fall mornings. Well made and great quality.
Not very soft or comfortable, bulky in weird places. After one wash already pilling and gathers pet hair like it’s its job
I love this sweatshirt and I even went a size up which I would recommend. I wear a medium and ordered a large which I am very pleased that I did. Great quality. Nice solid color and very comfortable.
El corte es tal cual la imagen. Tela grues, de calidad

It’s very comfortable and the fleece is perfect. I love the shape of the sweater and it’s true to size. The only thing I don’t like is the beige is more like a yellow pink. I wouldn’t quite call it beige, but it’s still alright.  EDIT: I may return this because I’m not a huge fan of the colour.
